functions.name: extract_incident_details
functions.description: Extracts structured information from an incident description including severity level, incident type, affected systems, and key details. This function analyzes the incident text and categorizes it appropriately.

incident_description.description: The raw incident description or report text to analyze

functions.name: get_standard_mitigation
functions.description: Retrieves standard mitigation steps and recommended actions based on the incident type and severity level. Returns a structured response with immediate actions, investigation steps, and escalation criteria.

severity.description: The severity level of the incident

affected_systems.description: List of systems or services affected by the incident
